basic.floral_language:
Chaenomeles speciosa
Floriography: beautiful, warm, tall 
The tree full of flowers, flower color is gorgeous, and flowers are fragrant, small and lovely. The fruits are red and edible as fresh. The flower is a symbol of wealth and auspicious. Chinese flowering along with peony, means "Full of riches and honor". The tree is often used as garden beautification and courtyard greening. 
The plants like abundant sunshine and flowering from March to May, ornamental period for 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period March-May, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, also more resistant to shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
